name: mcp-security-inspector
description: Chrome扩展 - MCP协议安全性检测工具

scripts.build:extension: npm run build && npm run copy-extension-files && npm run clean-dist
scripts.copy-extension-files: cp ./manifest.json public/ && cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/background.js dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ && cp -r public/_locales dist/
scripts.package: npm run build:extension && cd dist && zip -r ../mcp-security-inspector-v1.0.5.zip .
